reviews.review: This movie was okay. I personally felt there was too much fighting and not enough plot. As a result, I was bored at times. I've seen almost all of the comic book movies and liked most of them. However, I wouldn't call myself a comic book superhero fan. As a result of not being a comic book fan, I was not familiar with many of the superheroes in this film for much of the movie. Did I miss a superhero movie or two where they were introduced? Apparently. Since there was little plot to introduce them in this movie, I felt no connection with most of them. This movie did not have a happy ending but I suspect they'll fix that with a sequel. Since I didn't feel much of a connection to most of the characters, I didn't mourn their loss too much.
Very good movie. There's very little that I would change in this movie, Good pacing, Solid storyline. Villain was great, powerful but not perfect In his execution which is believeable.
As someone who is not a massive marvel fan, but a moderate fan, this movie held interest and had an intriguing plot line. Was a little long, though!

Great movie with an abundance of excellent actors and actresses , although for non-marvel fans a crazy mosh pit of superheroes is hard to keep up with . A great movie , with funny and emotional dialogue to entrench the viewer into the movie and a great experience for everyone to watch .
This movie kicked a$$ the whole way through. I can't wait to see what they do next! Josh Brolin was amazing, as was RDJ.

Well, it's all started with a big hit operation credit, then it's all came with the most exciting action sequence in the MCU. I have no comment on the movie until the final fight, which it was so short but thrilling. Then I saw Thanos weak... So weak. I wanted to see more avengers vs Thanos. The ending was great, exciting and thrilling. Which is makes me so excited and impatient to see the next avengers movie, which I hope it has an epic final fight. But it really is the best movie in the MCU.

Good time, plain and simple. Highlights were Guardians and Avengers (especially Thor) mixing it up, and Dr. Strange, which was unexpected for me. Knowing it wasn't the last Avengers movie didn't spoil it-- the ride itself was worth it.

This film fully deserves the success it has received. With great action sequences and, for the most part, spectacular visual effects, this movie has a great payoff to a whole 10 years worth of films in this series. While at times I felt as though the action scenes were cut short by switching back to a calmer and funnier scenes, where the tension got set back, I believe this is one of the greatest pop-culture events that we have experienced in the past decade. You can chalk this up to be a great, fun and action-packed superhero movies in recent years.
The best movie I have ever seen.

It was a blast! I loved it but not as much as I adored The Black Panther, though I was glad some parts were in Wakanda. Amazing cast, great action. Time flew watching it. Can't wait for Wonder Woman to save the universe.
